Chest Pain Clinic

Whether you have recently visited the Emergency Department or have been referred by another physician, the Chest Pain Clinic provides comprehensive assessment for patients experiencing chest discomfort or symptoms that may be related to heart disease.

What to Expect

  • You will be seen by one of our clinic physicians who specialize in internal medicine/cardiology.
  • Prior to your appointment, you will likely undergo an initial electrocardiogram (ECG).
  • During your consultation, the physician will review your ECG results and conduct a detailed assessment of your medical history and current symptoms.
  • Additional diagnostic tests, such as a stress test, Holter or event monitor, or cardiac imaging, may be ordered if clinically appropriate.
    • You may be required to meet with the physician at their office outside of the hospital to review the results of tests completed at a later date.
  • At the conclusion of your appointment, the physician will discuss the results and outline recommended next steps for your care.
